text: 'Be careful,she whispered from behind her fan.'Olimpia is watching us. The young man with her is Orlando Cavalcanti, Francesco's friend.' Orsini shot an impatient glance at the couple.'The young man with the mole?''Yes, indeed. 'No matter. They are not looking at us. Now I must know'he whispered,'what you meant, cara mia. Do you want your freedom in order to marry?
